markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Target of Psychic Ire](/Feats.aspx?ID=3689) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Amp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=425" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 29</row>

</column>

---

Your magic saturates your surroundings with hateful psychic energy. Use this amp in place of a psi cantrip's normal amp entry. The cantrip must be one that takes 2 or more actions to cast and targets a creature.
name: Target of Psychic Ire
